H0.text: What type of camel has two humps. Mongolian

H1.text: What type of camel has two humps. Arabian

H2.text: What type of camel has two humps. Persian

H3.text: What type of camel has two humps. Bactrian

A4.text: The Bactrian camel is also known as the Mongolian camel, two-humped camel, or double-humped camel.

A5.text: The Bactrian camel has two humps on its back, in contrast to the single-humped dromedary.

A6.text: The two-humped Bactrian camel makes up 6% of the world's camel population.
